candySpots.name: The Historic Brownstones
candySpots.description: Wealthy neighborhood known for giving out the best candy
candySpots.tips: Dress up well - they appreciate good costumes!

candySpots.name: Spooky Manor Estate
candySpots.description: Elaborate haunted house with premium treats
candySpots.tips: Don't be scared by the decorations - they're very generous!

candySpots.name: Witch House Candy Corner
candySpots.description: Historic witch house with themed Halloween treats
candySpots.tips: Get there early - they run out fast!

candySpots.name: Victorian Heights Mansions
candySpots.description: Beautiful Victorian homes with eco-friendly treats
candySpots.tips: Steep hills - wear comfortable shoes!

candySpots.name: Lincoln Park Family Zone
candySpots.description: Family-friendly neighborhood with consistent treats
candySpots.tips: Perfect for families with young kids!

candySpots.name: Haunted Hampstead Heath Homes
candySpots.description: Charming homes near Hampstead Heath with a spooky flair
candySpots.tips: Explore the park for some extra spooky vibes after trick-or-treating!

candySpots.name: Rosedale Riches
candySpots.description: Upscale Toronto neighborhood known for generous handouts
candySpots.tips: Beautiful decorations and friendly residents.

candySpots.name: Phibsborough Philanthropists
candySpots.description: Lively Dublin area with a strong community Halloween spirit
candySpots.tips: Many houses go all out with decorations!

candySpots.name: Old Town Haunts
candySpots.description: Cobblestone streets and haunted history blend with candy handouts
candySpots.tips: Be prepared for spooky tours mixed with trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Beverly Hills Bounty
candySpots.description: Celebrity homes often give out top-tier candy
candySpots.tips: Look for elaborate displays and premium candy.

candySpots.name: Queen Anne's Treats
candySpots.description: Hilly Seattle neighborhood with beautiful homes and generous candy
candySpots.tips: Great views and friendly atmosphere.

candySpots.name: Beacon Hill Sweets
candySpots.description: Historic gas-lit streets with elegant homes and quality treats
candySpots.tips: Iconic decorations and a charming atmosphere.

candySpots.name: Chestnut Hill Confections
candySpots.description: Leafy Philadelphia suburb known for its upscale trick-or-treating
candySpots.tips: Family-friendly and safe for younger children.

candySpots.name: Georgetown Goodies
candySpots.description: Historic and affluent neighborhood with generous candy givers
candySpots.tips: Expect beautifully decorated homes.

candySpots.name: Coral Gables Candy Aisle
candySpots.description: Beautiful, tree-lined streets with a festive, friendly atmosphere
candySpots.tips: Warm weather makes for comfortable trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Garden District Delights
candySpots.description: Stunning historic mansions with a rich, spooky history and great candy
candySpots.tips: Combine with a haunted tour for the full experience.

candySpots.name: Highlands Halloweentown
candySpots.description: Trendy Denver neighborhood with a strong community spirit for Halloween
candySpots.tips: Many homes have elaborate displays.

candySpots.name: Buckhead's Big Treats
candySpots.description: Atlanta's upscale district known for generous candy and lavish decorations
candySpots.tips: Look out for themed parties and events.

candySpots.name: Highland Park Harvest
candySpots.description: One of Dallas's most affluent areas, famous for its over-the-top Halloween
candySpots.tips: Expect huge crowds and incredible displays.

candySpots.name: River Oaks Riches
candySpots.description: Houston's premier neighborhood for upscale trick-or-treating
candySpots.tips: Elegant decorations and sophisticated treats.

candySpots.name: Arcadia's Oasis of Sweets
candySpots.description: Lush Phoenix neighborhood with a friendly Halloween vibe
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the warm desert evening while collecting candy.

candySpots.name: Hawthorne District Haunts
candySpots.description: Eclectic Portland street with shops and homes participating in Halloween
candySpots.tips: Great for unique costumes and a diverse crowd.

candySpots.name: Uptown Utopia of Candy
candySpots.description: Vibrant Minneapolis neighborhood known for lively Halloween participation
candySpots.tips: Dress warmly for chilly Midwestern evenings.

candySpots.name: Central West End Confections
candySpots.description: Historic St. Louis district with elegant homes and festive Halloween spirit
candySpots.tips: Many beautiful historic homes to admire.

candySpots.name: Ohio City Opulence
candySpots.description: Trendy Cleveland neighborhood with renovated homes and a festive atmosphere
candySpots.tips: Explore local breweries after trick-or-treating (for adults!).

candySpots.name: Indian Village Indulgences
candySpots.description: Historic Detroit neighborhood known for its grand homes and generous candy
candySpots.tips: Beautiful architecture and a welcoming community.

candySpots.name: Coronado Island Candies
candySpots.description: Charming island community with picturesque homes and abundant treats
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the ocean breeze while trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Kitsilano Kandy
candySpots.description: Popular Vancouver neighborhood with a family-friendly Halloween
candySpots.tips: Great for younger children and a vibrant community.

candySpots.name: Plateau Mont-Royal Parcels
candySpots.description: Trendy Montreal district with a festive, bohemian Halloween atmosphere
candySpots.tips: Walkable area with many shops participating.

candySpots.name: The Glebe's Generosity
candySpots.description: Upscale Ottawa neighborhood known for its excellent trick-or-treating
candySpots.tips: Family-oriented and very safe.

candySpots.name: Mount Royal Marvels
candySpots.description: Affluent Calgary neighborhood with beautifully decorated homes
candySpots.tips: A bit hilly, but worth it for the treats.

candySpots.name: Balmain Bonanza
candySpots.description: Historic Sydney suburb with a growing Halloween presence
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the spring weather while trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Fitzroy Festivities
candySpots.description: Bohemian Melbourne neighborhood with a creative Halloween atmosphere
candySpots.tips: Look for quirky decorations and independent shops.

candySpots.name: Ponsonby Perks
candySpots.description: Trendy Auckland suburb with stylish homes and enthusiastic participation
candySpots.tips: A great spot for families and lively events.

candySpots.name: Condesa Confectioneries
candySpots.description: Art Deco neighborhood blending Halloween with Día de Muertos traditions
candySpots.tips: Experience unique cultural blends in decorations.

candySpots.name: Montmartre Mystical Munchies
candySpots.description: Charming Parisian neighborhood with a whimsical Halloween touch
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the historic atmosphere while collecting treats.

candySpots.name: Prenzlauer Berg Presents
candySpots.description: Family-friendly Berlin district with a growing Halloween tradition
candySpots.tips: Many cafes and shops participate.

candySpots.name: Jordaan Jollies
candySpots.description: Picturesque Amsterdam neighborhood with charming Halloween decorations
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the canals and costumes!

candySpots.name: Ixelles Indulgences
candySpots.description: Vibrant Brussels district known for its diverse community and Halloween spirit
candySpots.tips: A welcoming atmosphere for families.

candySpots.name: Nørrebro Nosh
candySpots.description: Multicultural Copenhagen neighborhood embracing Halloween fun
candySpots.tips: Many small shops and cafes participate.

candySpots.name: Södermalm Sweets
candySpots.description: Trendy Stockholm island with a lively Halloween atmosphere
candySpots.tips: Great views of the city and creative costumes.

candySpots.name: Grünerløkka Goodies
candySpots.description: Bohemian Oslo district with a community-focused Halloween
candySpots.tips: Artistic decorations and friendly locals.

candySpots.name: Kallio Kandy Land
candySpots.description: Lively Helsinki neighborhood with a fun, urban Halloween vibe
candySpots.tips: A younger crowd and active nightlife after trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Shibuya Sweet Spot
candySpots.description: Famous for its huge Halloween street parties and costume parades
candySpots.tips: More for atmosphere and costumes than traditional trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Setagaya Family Fun
candySpots.description: Quiet, family-friendly Tokyo district with traditional trick-or-treating
candySpots.tips: Best for young children.

candySpots.name: Itaewon Indulgences
candySpots.description: Seoul's international district, known for its vibrant Halloween parties and foreign-friendly trick-or-treating
candySpots.tips: Expect a festive, party-like atmosphere.

candySpots.name: Holland Village Haunts
candySpots.description: Expat-friendly Singapore neighborhood with enthusiastic Halloween celebrations
candySpots.tips: Look for themed events in local shops.

candySpots.name: Repulse Bay Riches
candySpots.description: Upscale Hong Kong neighborhood with a strong expat community and festive homes
candySpots.tips: Enjoy ocean views with your candy collection.

candySpots.name: Arabian Ranches Goodies
candySpots.description: Family-oriented Dubai community with lavish Halloween decorations and treats
candySpots.tips: Many community events and safe streets.

candySpots.name: Camps Bay Confections
candySpots.description: Scenic Cape Town suburb known for its beautiful homes and friendly Halloween
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the stunning mountain and ocean backdrop.

candySpots.name: Palermo Palooza
candySpots.description: Trendy Buenos Aires neighborhood with lively Halloween events and parties
candySpots.tips: Many bars and restaurants also have special events.

candySpots.name: Copacabana Carnival of Candy
candySpots.description: Iconic Rio beach neighborhood with a festive Halloween spirit
candySpots.tips: Combine trick-or-treating with beach activities.

candySpots.name: Historic Dublin Delights
candySpots.description: Charming Ohio town with a very active community Halloween
candySpots.tips: Check out the annual 'Halloween Spooktacular' event.

candySpots.name: Savannah's Spooky Sweets
candySpots.description: America's most haunted city offers a truly atmospheric Halloween
candySpots.tips: Ghost tours often coincide with trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Belle Meade Bounty
candySpots.description: Affluent Nashville neighborhood known for its lavish homes and generous candy
candySpots.tips: One of the best places in Nashville for quality candy.

candySpots.name: Upper West Side Sweet Haul
candySpots.description: A family-friendly area with beautiful pre-war buildings and generous treat-givers.
candySpots.tips: Stick to the side streets off Central Park West for the best decorations.

candySpots.name: Park Slope Pumpkin Path
candySpots.description: Known as one of the best spots in Brooklyn for young trick-or-treaters. Very safe.
candySpots.tips: Go early! The streets get packed with families and strollers.

candySpots.name: Astoria's Candy Cauldron
candySpots.description: A diverse neighborhood where both local businesses and homes give out treats.
candySpots.tips: Check out the decorated storefronts along Ditmars Boulevard.

candySpots.name: Chestnut Street Charm
candySpots.description: One of the most architecturally beautiful streets in America, with residents who are serious about Halloween.
candySpots.tips: Appreciate the historic architecture as much as the candy!

candySpots.name: Gallows Hill Generosity
candySpots.description: The neighborhood surrounding the infamous Gallows Hill park has a spooky and generous spirit.
candySpots.tips: Very atmospheric and eerie, great for older kids and adults.

candySpots.name: Castro's Colorful Candies
candySpots.description: Known for its festive and theatrical atmosphere, Halloween here is a huge block party.
candySpots.tips: More of a party vibe, but many residents and shops give out great candy.

candySpots.name: Presidio Heights Palate Pleasers
candySpots.description: An affluent area with large, beautifully decorated mansions that give out premium treats.
candySpots.tips: Houses are far apart, so it's less walking for more reward.

candySpots.name: Old Town Triangle Treats
candySpots.description: Charming, historic neighborhood with a strong community feel and lots of participation.
candySpots.tips: The area is very walkable and well-lit.

candySpots.name: Wicker Park Wonders
candySpots.description: A trendy neighborhood where independent boutiques and hip residents get into the spirit.
candySpots.tips: Look for creative, artistic decorations and unique treats.

candySpots.name: Notting Hill Night Haul
candySpots.description: Famous for its colorful houses and affluent residents who are known to be generous.
candySpots.tips: It's a popular spot, so expect crowds, but the payoff is worth it.

candySpots.name: Greenwich Ghostly Goodies
candySpots.description: Trick-or-treat among historic naval buildings and charming residential streets.
candySpots.tips: The proximity to the Cutty Sark and old maritime pubs adds a spooky vibe.

candySpots.name: The Annex's Autumnal Bounty
candySpots.description: A popular neighborhood for students and families, known for its creative decorations.
candySpots.tips: Many of the large Victorian homes go all-out for Halloween.

candySpots.name: Leslieville's Loot Lane
candySpots.description: A very family-friendly area in the east end with a strong community spirit.
candySpots.tips: Perfect for younger kids; the community is very welcoming.

candySpots.name: Clontarf Coastal Candies
candySpots.description: A seaside suburb where families embrace the 'Samhain' spirit with bonfires and treats.
candySpots.tips: The sea air and old traditions make for a unique atmosphere.

candySpots.name: Morningside's Monster Munch
candySpots.description: An affluent and leafy suburb where the large Victorian homes offer quality treats.
candySpots.tips: Known for being safe and welcoming for families.

candySpots.name: Santa Monica Sweet Strip
candySpots.description: The streets north of Montana Ave are famous for incredible decorations and even better candy.
candySpots.tips: It's a scene! Go for the people-watching as much as the candy.

candySpots.name: Pasadena's Prospect Park
candySpots.description: Historic 'Millionaire's Row' and the surrounding craftsman homes are a Halloween hotspot.
candySpots.tips: Beautiful, sprawling homes mean a bit more walking between stops.

candySpots.name: Ballard's Bounty Blocks
candySpots.description: The neighborhood's Nordic roots and family focus make for a fun and festive Halloween.
candySpots.tips: Focus on the streets around Sunset Hill for the best experience.

candySpots.name: Capitol Hill Candy Crawl
candySpots.description: A vibrant and dense neighborhood where both apartments and houses participate enthusiastically.
candySpots.tips: Check out the elaborate decorations on the historic homes on 14th Ave.

candySpots.name: South End Spooky Sweets
candySpots.description: The Victorian brownstones are beautifully decorated and residents are known for quality treats.
candySpots.tips: The area around Union Park is particularly festive.

candySpots.name: Cambridge Candy Haul
candySpots.description: The neighborhoods around Harvard and MIT have a quirky, intellectual Halloween vibe.
candySpots.tips: Expect some cleverly themed decorations from the academic community.

candySpots.name: Rittenhouse Row's Riches
candySpots.description: High-end shops and elegant townhouses around the square often participate.
candySpots.tips: A more sophisticated, less crowded trick-or-treating experience.

candySpots.name: Capitol Hill Candy Collection
candySpots.description: The historic rowhouses in this neighborhood are known for their enthusiastic participation.
candySpots.tips: East Capitol Street is the main hub of activity; expect a friendly crowd.

candySpots.name: Pinecrest's Premium Pantry
candySpots.description: A suburban village with large properties and a reputation for giving out lots of candy.
candySpots.tips: Great for filling up your bag quickly due to the generosity of the residents.

candySpots.name: Uptown's Ultimate Treats
candySpots.description: The sprawling historic homes along St. Charles Avenue are a prime destination.
candySpots.tips: Take the streetcar for a unique way to get around the area.

candySpots.name: Wash Park's Wealth of Sweets
candySpots.description: A very popular and safe neighborhood for families with young children.
candySpots.tips: The streets can get very crowded, so plan accordingly.

candySpots.name: Virginia-Highland's Hoard
candySpots.description: A charming, walkable neighborhood with historic bungalows that get very festive.
candySpots.tips: The decorations are top-notch and very creative.

candySpots.name: Lakewood's Legendary Loot
candySpots.description: Known for its elaborate, professionally-done yard displays and incredible candy.
candySpots.tips: Some streets are blocked off for pedestrians. Be prepared to walk and be amazed.

candySpots.name: The Heights' Historic Haul
candySpots.description: The Victorian and Craftsman homes in this historic neighborhood are a treat to see.
candySpots.tips: A very walkable area with a strong sense of community.

candySpots.name: Scottsdale's Sweetest Sprawl
candySpots.description: Affluent parts of Scottsdale are famous for giving out the best and biggest candy.
candySpots.tips: Neighborhoods are spread out, so driving between areas is common.

candySpots.name: Nob Hill's Noble Nibbles
candySpots.description: The historic Alphabet District's beautiful Victorian homes are a prime spot for quality treats.
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the charming, slightly spooky architecture while you walk.

candySpots.name: Edina's Exquisite Edibles
candySpots.description: An affluent suburb known for its safety and residents who give out top-tier candy.
candySpots.tips: A reliable spot for a huge and high-quality candy haul.

candySpots.name: Webster Groves' Goodies
candySpots.description: A classic American suburb with a very strong Halloween tradition and participation.
candySpots.tips: A very safe and family-friendly environment.

candySpots.name: Shaker Heights' Sweet Stash
candySpots.description: Historic, wealthy suburb where the grand homes are known for being very generous.
candySpots.tips: The houses are large and spread out, making it a pleasant walk.

candySpots.name: Grosse Pointe's Grand Giveaway
candySpots.description: One of Michigan's wealthiest areas, legendary for its Halloween generosity.
candySpots.tips: Focus on the streets nearest the lake for the most impressive mansions.

candySpots.name: La Jolla's Lavish Loot
candySpots.description: The beautiful homes in this seaside community are known for quality over quantity.
candySpots.tips: Enjoy the cool ocean breeze and stunning views.

candySpots.name: Shaughnessy's Sweet Spoils
candySpots.description: Vancouver's most opulent neighborhood, where the mansions give out the best candy.
candySpots.tips: The decorations are often professionally done and spectacular.

candySpots.name: Westmount's Wealth of Treats
candySpots.description: An affluent anglophone enclave known for its beautiful homes and generous spirit.
candySpots.tips: Some streets are quite steep, so be prepared for a bit of a climb.

candySpots.name: Westboro's Wicked Wares
candySpots.description: A trendy area where both shops on Richmond Road and the nearby homes participate.
candySpots.tips: Great for families who want to combine trick-or-treating with a stroll.

candySpots.name: Kensington's Candy Crawl
candySpots.description: The 'urban village' of Kensington has many participating shops and nearby homes.
candySpots.tips: A great early evening option for younger kids.

candySpots.name: Paddington's Posh Portions
candySpots.description: The stylish Victorian terrace houses in this area are known for getting into the spirit.
candySpots.tips: A very trendy and safe area to walk around.

candySpots.name: St Kilda's Spooky Sweets
candySpots.description: A vibrant beachside suburb with an eclectic mix of homes and a fun atmosphere.
candySpots.tips: Can be lively, with a mix of families and party-goers.

candySpots.name: Remuera's Rich Rewards
candySpots.description: One of Auckland's most affluent suburbs, known for generous handouts.
candySpots.tips: The quiet, leafy streets are perfect for a relaxed Halloween.

candySpots.name: Coyoacán's Calavera Candies
candySpots.description: This colonial neighborhood blends Halloween with incredible Día de Muertos displays.
candySpots.tips: Experience a unique cultural celebration alongside trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Le Marais' Macabre Morsels
candySpots.description: Chic boutiques and historic apartments in this trendy district often participate.
candySpots.tips: A very stylish Halloween experience.

candySpots.name: Kreuzberg's Creative Candy
candySpots.description: Berlin's famously cool and diverse district has a laid-back but fun Halloween.
candySpots.tips: Expect artistic and unconventional decorations.

candySpots.name: De Pijp's Delicious Delights
candySpots.description: A lively, bohemian neighborhood with a strong community feel for Halloween.
candySpots.tips: The nearby Albert Cuyp Market sometimes has Halloween-themed stalls.

candySpots.name: Uccle's Upscale Offerings
candySpots.description: A wealthy, leafy suburb where you're likely to get some of Belgium's finest chocolates.
candySpots.tips: A quiet and high-quality trick-or-treating experience.

candySpots.name: Frederiksberg's Finest Feast
candySpots.description: An elegant, upscale area known for its beautiful parks and generous residents.
candySpots.tips: Very family-friendly and safe.

candySpots.name: Gamla Stan's Ghostly Goods
candySpots.description: Trick-or-treating in Stockholm's medieval old town is a uniquely spooky experience.
candySpots.tips: The narrow, cobbled alleys are incredibly atmospheric after dark.

candySpots.name: Frogner's Frightful Fare
candySpots.description: An affluent west-end borough with beautiful apartment buildings and homes.
candySpots.tips: Close to the famous Vigeland Park for a pre-candy stroll.

candySpots.name: Punavuori's Premium Portions
candySpots.description: Helsinki's Design District offers treats from both chic boutiques and stylish residents.
candySpots.tips: A great place for unique, design-oriented decorations.

candySpots.name: Harajuku's Horror Pop Treats
candySpots.description: While not traditional trick-or-treating, many shops on Takeshita Street give out candy to costumed visitors.
candySpots.tips: Go for the spectacle and costumes; the candy is a bonus.

candySpots.name: Hongdae's Halloween Haul
candySpots.description: The youthful, artistic area around Hongik University is full of Halloween events and participating businesses.
candySpots.tips: A fantastic spot for seeing creative, handmade costumes.

candySpots.name: East Coast Park's Candy Path
candySpots.description: The landed properties in this area are known for being very Halloween-friendly and generous.
candySpots.tips: A safe and pleasant area for families with kids.

candySpots.name: SoHo's Spooky Sweets
candySpots.description: The trendy bars and restaurants around the Mid-Levels escalator often have Halloween promotions and candy.
candySpots.tips: More adult-oriented, but a very festive atmosphere.

candySpots.name: Jumeirah Lakes Towers' Treat Trail
candySpots.description: Many of the residential towers organize trick-or-treating events, making it easy and safe.
candySpots.tips: Great for young kids as it's contained within buildings and community areas.

candySpots.name: Gardens' Ghostly Giveaway
candySpots.description: A centrally located, leafy suburb with a vibrant community that gets into the Halloween spirit.
candySpots.tips: Close to many trendy restaurants on Kloof Street for a post-candy dinner.

candySpots.name: Recoleta's Rich Reserves
candySpots.description: The Parisian-style buildings in this elegant neighborhood house some generous treat-givers.
candySpots.tips: The nearby Recoleta Cemetery adds a genuinely spooky backdrop to the evening.

candySpots.name: Ipanema's Island of Treats
candySpots.description: The upscale apartments and homes in this world-famous neighborhood host festive gatherings.
candySpots.tips: A chic and relaxed Halloween experience with a beachy vibe.

candySpots.name: Muirfield Village's Monster Mash
candySpots.description: The upscale golf course community is known for its impressive homes and Halloween generosity.
candySpots.tips: A very safe, well-lit, and rewarding place for trick-or-treating.

candySpots.name: Ardsley Park's Autumnal Cache
candySpots.description: One of Savannah's first suburbs, with beautiful historic homes and a strong community feel.
candySpots.tips: The old oak trees covered in Spanish moss create a perfect spooky setting.

candySpots.name: East Nashville's Eclectic Eats
candySpots.description: A hip and artistic neighborhood known for its creative and elaborate Halloween displays.
candySpots.tips: Expect unique, handmade decorations and a fun, quirky vibe.
